argumentText:
ARGUMENT
p

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmaplub.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | pmaplub.u | |- U = ( lub ` K ) |
| 3 |  | pmaplub.m | |- M = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( le ` K ) = ( le ` K ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Atoms ` K ) = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5, 3 | #P_pmapval | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( M ` X ) = { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` ( M ` X ) ) = ( U ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hlomcmat | |- ( K e. HL -> ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 4, 2, 5 | #P_atlatmstc | |- ( ( ( K e. OML /\ K e. CLat /\ K e. AtLat ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) = X ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` { p e. ( Atoms ` K ) | p ( le ` K ) X } ) = X ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( U ` ( M ` X ) ) = X ) |
